headline: What's driving confidence in Big Banks ahead of earnings
summary: Big Bank stocks, including JPMorgan (JPM) and Morgan Stanley (MS), were recently upgraded by KBW just before bank earnings kick off next week. KBW managing director and head of US bank research Christopher McGratty and Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter David Hollerith join Market Domination Overtime to break down what's driving sentiment across the banking sector. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime here.

headline: Keep Buffett's Advice in Mind as Q2 Earnings Season Nears
summary: Warren Buffett’s 1986 letter to Berkshire Hathaway Inc. (BRK.A) shareholders read: “We simply attempt to be fearful when others are greedy and to be greedy only when others are fearful.” We are in a period of market greed right now, even if you haven’t noticed it. So, this week, make sure to take a good look at your portfolio, observes Kelly Green, editor of Dividend Digest.
